☑️Bring your own coffee cups & shopping bags https://t.co/rbeqYVp4bO

🖐️Always wash your hands
🍗Separate raw & cooked meat
🍳Cook thoroughly
🌡️Keep food at safe temperatures
🚰Use safe water
